title: Verify: Verify NHL.TV app icon successfully displays on Apple TV Home Menu
custom_preconds: NHL.TV has been installed on the device
custom_steps:
Scroll though the Apple TV Home Menu items and locate the NHL.TV app
and observe the art/logo
custom_expected: NHL.TV app displays approved NHL logo/art

title: Verify > Wireless Connection > Verify: Selecting NHL.TV app icon successfully opens the app
custom_preconds:
NHL.TV has been installed on the device
Device is connected wirelessly to network
custom_steps: Select the NHL.TV app from the Apple TV Home Menu
custom_expected: NHL.TV app will launch and user will be taken into the app

title: Verify > Wired Collection > Selecting NHL.TV app icon successfully opens the app
custom_preconds:
NHL.TV has been installed on the device
The ATV device has wired connection
custom_steps: Select the NHL.TV app from the Apple TV Home Menu
custom_expected: NHL.TV app will launch and user will be taken into the app

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND a Free NHL.com User account has been created
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Free NHL.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Free NHL.com User account password
custom_expected: Free User / Non- Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to play FGOTD Live/VOD archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content

IF OFF-SEASON, YOU MAY USE MARCH 1 - EDM VS. BUF of 15-16 SEASON
(update the above game with a valid game if after the 16-17 season)
custom_expected: Playback will be initiated for any/all available FGOTD Live/VOD archive file(s)

title: FGOTD Ads trigger - Pre-Roll Ads Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content

IF OFF-SEASON, YOU MAY USE MARCH 1 - EDM VS. BUF of 15-16 SEASON
(update the above game with a valid game if after the 16-17 season)
custom_expected: FGOTD Asset must Show Freewheel served pre-roll video ads to user before Playback begins

title: Trigger - Recap Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Recap Assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Recap media content
custom_expected: Recap Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Recap playback begins

title: Trigger - Game Highlights Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Highlights Assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Game Highlight media content
custom_expected: Game Highlight Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Game Highlight playback begins

title: Non-FGOTW Gameday Upsell/Sign-in Notification for Free User/Non-Entitlement account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps: If user selects any non-blacked out, live/archived game (that is not FGOTW)
custom_expected:
THEN they will not be able to view the game
And  will receive a message indicating they must have a premium subscription to watch selected content.

title: Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND a Monthly NHL.com User account has been purchased/entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Premium Monthly NHL.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Premium Monthly NHL.com User account password
custom_expected: THE Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

title: Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD archive games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Premium Monthly account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date that contains Game Content Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for Game Content Assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the NHL.TV Game media content
custom_expected: THE Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD archive games

title: Premium Yearly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND a Yearly NHL.com User account has been purchased/entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Premium Yearly NHL.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Premium Yearly NHL.com User account password
custom_expected: THE Premium yearly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

title: Premium Annual account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games

GIVEN the NHL.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Premium Yearly account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date that contains Game Content Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for Game Content Assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the NHL.TV Game media content
custom_expected: THE Premium Annual account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games

title: Blackout - Local - Home Feed - LIVE
custom_preconds:
During season, able to test on the Prod build if local team is playing at test time and has a live video feed
Blackout games: in SF = San Jose Sharks
Blackout games: in NY = NY Rangers or Islanders
User is logged into a Premium production account

Off-season
- QA environment features local Blackout games (in SF that's any San Jose Sharks game, in NY any NY Rangers or Islanders game) with live video feed
- User is logged in to QA-facing app with entitled account
custom_steps:
Open game tile for local game with live video attached
Select the HOME team's feed
custom_expected: Feed select shows expected blackout messaging - check current message QA config for specific device to confirm correct/expected text

title: Blackout - Local - Away Feed - LIVE
custom_preconds:
During season, able to test on the Prod build if local team is playing at test time and has a live video feed
Blackout games: in SF = San Jose Sharks
Blackout games: in NY = NY Rangers or Islanders
User is logged into a Premium production account

Off-season
- QA environment features local Blackout games (in SF that's any San Jose Sharks game, in NY any NY Rangers or Islanders game) with live video feed
- User is logged in to QA-facing app with entitled account
custom_steps:
Open game tile for local game with live video attached
Select the AWAY team's feed
custom_expected: Feed select shows expected blackout messaging - check current message QA config for specific device to confirm correct/expected text

title: Blackout - National
custom_preconds:
A national Blackout game is available to test 

or

QA environment features National Blackout game
User is logged in to QA-facing app with entitled account
custom_steps: Open game tile for National game with live video attached
custom_expected: eed select shows expected blackout messaging - check current message QA config for specific device to confirm correct/expected text

title: NHL.TV Verify tab menu categories display as expected
custom_preconds:
IF app has been installed
AND has been launched
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Bypass the Welcome Screen if first launch (needs confirmation this is applicable for ATV)
custom_expected:
If User has not logged in:
THEN user sees at right of screen these categories in following order top to bottom:
>>Today's Games / Scores
>>Video
>>Teams
>>Standings
>>Buy NHL.TV™
>>Settings

If User has logged in:
THEN user sees at right of screen these categories in following order top to bottom:
>>Today's Games / Scores
>>Video
>>Teams
>>Standings
>>Settings


NHL.TV Logo appears in the upper right corner
Team logos will display and cycle through each team on the left side
If first Launch, ensure the Welcome Message is displayed

NOTE:  The 'Standings' category will only display during an active season.  Off-season the category does not display.

title: Rogers Game Center Verify tab menu and categories display as expected
custom_preconds:
IF app has been installed
AND has been launched
custom_steps:
Launch the NHL.TV app
Bypass the Welcome Screen if first launch
custom_expected:
If User has not logged in:
THEN user sees at right of screen these categories in following order top to bottom:
>>Today's Games / Scores
>>Video
>>Teams
>>Standings
>>Buy Rogers NHL GameCentre LIVE™
>>Settings

If User has logged in:
THEN user sees at right of screen 4 categories in following order top to bottom:
>>Today's Games / Scores
>>Video
>>Teams
>>Standings
>>Settings

Rogers GameCenter LIVE Logo appears in the upper right corner
Team logos will display and cycle through each team on the left side
If first Launch, ensure the Welcome Message is displayed

Rogers GameCenter Logo appears in the upper right corner
Team logos will display and cycle through each team on the left side
If first Launch, ensure the Welcome Message is displayed

NOTE: The 'Standings' category will only display during an active season. Off-season the category does not display.

title: Scores: Launching score will take the user to the correct date and will display today's schedule
custom_preconds: NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV App
2. Select "Scores" from the main menu
custom_expected:
- The user should be taken to the correct date and the scheduled games for that day should appear.
- Make sure to scroll through the list of each game for that day and ensure the correct team logo appears
- Ensure the correct time is displayed

NOTE:  IF IN THE OFF SEASON, THE USER SHOULD BE TAKEN TO THE FIRST AVAILABLE PRESEASON GAME OF THE YEAR.

title: Scores: Today's game navigation
custom_preconds: NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV App
2. Select Scores from the main menu
custom_expected:
- User will be taken to the correct date
- Correct schedule of games is displayed
- Each tile displays team logo
- When specific tile is highlighted, the correct team logos are displayed on the left side. (Ex. Bos @ Phi, team logos both appear on the tile and left side of page)
- Correct text appears according to teams that are playing

title: Scores: Date Navigation
custom_preconds: NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Scores from the main menu
3. Press Left or right on the remote
custom_expected:
- Pressing right on the controller take the user to future dates
- Pressing left on the controller take the user to past dates
- The games according to the schedule are correctly displayed
- All team logos and text displays correctly

title: Highlights: User is able to launch highlights from the feed menu
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Scores from the Main Menu
3. Select either a live game or VOD that has highlights available
custom_expected:
- User is able to launch highlights without issue
- Highlights display the correct text
- Thumbnails display

*Note: Highlight will appear on the feed tab even when hide scores is turned on

title: Game Recap: User us able to launch the Game Recap from the feed menu
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Scores from the main menu
3. Select a VOD game that has a Game Recap
4. Select the Game Recap
custom_expected:
- User is able to launch the Game Recap
- When hide scores is off, user will see score in title
 - When hide scores is ON, user will not see score in title
- Thumbnail image appears
- All text displays without any issues

title: Extended Highlight: User is able to launch the Extended highlight from the feed menu
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Scores from the main menu
3. Select a either a live or VOD game that has an extended highlight
4. Select the Extended Highlight from the game feed page
custom_expected:
- User is able to launch the Extended highlight
- Thumbnail appears
- There are no issues with the txt

title: Game Recap: Hide Scores On: User does not see score in Recap title
custom_preconds:
the NHL.TV app has been installed
Hide Scores has been turned on
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Scores from the main menu
3. Select a VOD game that has a Game Recap
4. Select the Game Recap
custom_expected:
With Hide Scores ON, the user should not see the score in the title
- Game Recap only appears

title: Extended Highlight: Hide Scores On: User does not see score in Extended Highlight title
custom_preconds:
the NHL.TV app has been installed
Hide scores has been turned ON
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Scores from the main menu
3. Select a VOD game that has a Extended Highlights
4. Select the Extended Highlight
custom_expected:
With Hide Scores ON, the date and game score should not appear in the title
- Extended highlight appears in the title

title: Video: Launch Video from the main menu takes the user to the video section page
Video: Launching any video here will have video playback
Video: At the end of each video, if there is another video in the queue, the app will automatically start up the next video
Video: When the last video on the page ends, then the user should be brought back to the Video Page
Video: Pre-Roll ads should appear after 3-5 videos are played
Video: Video description, time, and date should appear under every thumbnail
Video: Leaving the Video Section should bring the user back to the main menu of the app
Teams: Launching Team from the main menu takes the user to the teams page
custom_preconds: NHL.TV has been installed on the device
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Teams from the main menu
custom_expected:
- User will be taken to the teams page
- User will see Eastern Conference first and then Western Conference
- All team logos will appear without issues
- All team names (text) will appear without issue
- If in US, the NHL.TV Logo will appear in the upper right corner
- If in CA, the Rogers GameCenter logo will appear in the right corner

title: Teams: Selecting a team will take you to the correct teams game schedule
custom_preconds: NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV App
2. Select Teams from the Main Menu
3. On the Teams page, select a team.
custom_expected:
- Once the user selects the team, they are taken to the correct team page and the correct schedule appears
- The teams logo will display on the the left side and there should be no issues
- Team name appears at the top of the page
- Team record appears below the team name
- User will default to the Recent tab
- User will default to "Add as Favorite" tab

Perform test for all 30 teams

title: Teams: Recent Tab
custom_preconds: NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Teams from the Main Menu
3. Select a team from the Teams page
custom_expected:
- User will default on the Recent tab
- User will see the most recent game at the top, followed by the previous games
- If scores are ON, user will see the scores appear on the left side as each tile is highlighted
- If scores are OFF, the user will not see scores on the left side

Perform test for all 30 teams

title: Teams: Upcoming Tab
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV App
2. Select Teams from the Main Menu
3. Select a team from the Teams page
4. Select "upcoming" from the team page
custom_expected:
- User will only see games that are upcoming
- User will NOT see games that are either for that day or for previous days

Perform test for all 30 teams

title: Teams: Add as Favorite Option
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Teams from the main menu
3. Select a team from the teams page
4. highlight the "Add as Favorite" option from the team page
custom_expected:
- User is able to select and make the team their favorite
- User is able to Remove the team as they favorite if they have already favorited that team

Perform test for all 30 teams

title: Standings: Selecting Standings from the main menu takes the user to the standings page
custom_preconds: NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Standings from the Main Menu
custom_expected: - User is taken to the Standings page

title: Standings: Navigation of the Standings Page
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Standing from the main menu
3. Navigate using by pressing left and right on the Apple Remote
custom_expected:
- User will land in the Atlantic Conference
- each division will display the team, GP, W-L-OT, PTS and ROW
- Divisions will appear in the following order Atlantic, Metropolitan, Central and Pacific
- Atlantic and Metropolitan will have the Eastern Conference logo behind them
- Central and Pacific will have the Western Conference logo behind them

*NOTE: Wildcard standing will not be shown on ATV devices

title: Settings: Hide Scores
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV App
2. Select Settings from the main menu
3. Select Hide Scores
custom_expected:
- User is able to select hide scores form the settings menu
- Hide scores, if tuned ON, will hide scores from all games (Live and VOD)
- Hide scores, if tuned ON, will hide scores from Extended Highlight and Game Recap titles

title: Settings: Terms of Service
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Settings from the main menu
3. Select Terms of Service from the settings menu
custom_expected:
- User is taken to the Terms of Service and the correct copy is displayed.
- Current Effective date is 1/28/2016

title: Settings: Privacy Policy
custom_preconds: the NHL.TV app has been installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Settings from the main menu
3. Select Privacy Policy from the settings menu
custom_expected:
- User is able to view the Privacy Policy and the correct copy is displayed
- The current effective date is 1/28/2016

title: Settings: Log Out
custom_preconds:
the NHL.TV app has been installed
User is already logged in with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV app
2. Select Settings from the main menu
3. Select Log Out from the Settings menu
custom_expected: - User is able to disconnect from their NHL.TV or Rogers GameCenter account

title: Settings: Buy NHL.TV
custom_preconds:
the NHL.TV app has been installed
User is not logged in with a valid NHL.TV or Rogers GameCenter Account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV App
2. Select Settings from the main menu
3. Select Buy NHL.TV
custom_expected: - User is taken to the Buy NHL.TV upsell page

title: Wired Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the NHL.TV AppleTV (Gen 4) device connected to a wired network connection
AND the user has accessed the "NHL.TV" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any game media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY game media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the game media video stream will launch successfully
AND the game media content file will play without issue

title: Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the NHL.TV AppleTV (Gen 4) device connected to a wireless network connection
AND the user has accessed the "NHL.TV" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any game media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY game media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the game media video stream will launch successfully
AND the game media content file will play without issue

title: Full VOD Archive Playback to Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "NHL.TV" application
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY ARCHIVE/VOD video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Full Live Game Linear Playback to Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "NHL.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY LIVE video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Seek FWD to Exit - VOD Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "NHL.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek to the END of video
custom_expected: THEN the video will transition from playback and return to the Schedule (asset) page gracefully

title: Seek BACK (RWD) to Front of Program
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "NHL.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek FWD > 10 mins into program
AND allow > 30 secs of playback
AND seek BACK (RWD) to head of program
custom_expected: THEN the video will resume playback from beginning and continue without issue

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
Ads: Verify that ads are appearing before highlight playback
Ads: Verify that between at least 2-5 videos, an ad plays on the next video played.

title: IAP: US Year account purchase
custom_preconds:
the NHL.TV app has been installed
iTunes US Test account has been created
External email address has been created and has never been tied to an NHL account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV build
2. Select Buy NHL.TV from the Main Menu or from the Settings menu
3. Select the $129.99 art asset to begin the purchase flow
4. Enter a Valid iTunes Account Email and then Password
5. Enter  valid external email address
6. Select Buy on the Confirm you In-App Purchase
7. Log into the external email account that was used to create the NHL.TV Account
custom_expected:
- User should be able to complete the IAP purchase flow in the NHL.TV App
- User should see NHL Registration emails in the account that was used the create the NHL.TV account
- User should be able to complete the NHL.TV account registration flow

title: IAP: US: Complete a purchase with a New Zealand account
custom_preconds:
the NHL.TV app has been installed
iTunes NZ Test account has been created
External email address has been created and has never been tied to an NHL account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV build
2. Select Buy NHL.TV from the Main Menu or from the Settings menu
3. Select the $129.99 art asset to begin the purchase flow
4. Enter a Valid NZ iTunes Account Email and then Password
5. Select to switch to the NZ Store 
6. Enter valid external email address
7. Select Buy on the Confirm you In-App Purchase
8. Log into the external email account that was used to create the NHL.TV Account
custom_expected:
User should be able to complete the IAP purchase flow in the NHL.TV App
User should see NHL Registration emails in the account that was used the create the NHL.TV account
User should be able to complete the NHL.TV account registration flow

title: IAP: Complete a Rogers Gamecenter Live Purchase Flow with a Canadian Account
custom_preconds:
the NHL.TV app has been installed
iTunes CA Test account has been created
External email address has been created and has never been tied to an Rogers account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the NHL.TV build
2. Select Buy Rogers GameCenter Live from the Main Menu or from the Settings menu
3. Select the $129.99 art asset to begin the purchase flow
4. Enter a Valid CA iTunes Account Email and then Password
5. Select to switch to the CA Store

7. Select Buy on the Confirm you In-App Purchase
